content.body: Steve Hicks: Here's the data I extracted from Chrome for the sources for various events: https://gist.github.com/andreubotella/e1127d588f85ef74cd58b2bd25a652ff
content.formatted_body: Steve Hicks: Here's the data I extracted from Chrome for the sources for various events: https://gist.github.com/andreubotella/e1127d588f85ef74cd58b2bd25a652ff

content.body: since the same event name can have different meanings, the mapping is event name → WebIDL interface name (well, rather C++ class name in Chromium) → source data
there are fewer events with an async source than I'd have expected, but I think this is because Chromium isn't tracking all sources
